lead_paragraph: DEAN--Anthony. The Board of Directors of the Eastern District Civil Litigation Fund mourns the passing of its President and colleague, Anthony "Tony" Dean, who tirelessly devoted his energies in leading the Fund's efforts for many years to support pro se litigants before the United States District Court for the Eastern District of New York. 1/3
